name: tap
title: TAP
intro: TAP is my lastest project which I am working on responsive template by HTML5&CSS3. How difficult is some point needs to pay attention to the detail.
content: TAP is my lastest project which I am working on responsive template by HTML5&CSS3. How difficult is some point needs to pay attention to the detail.

name: nation
title: Nation
intro: Nation Broadcasting Corporation is my recent workplace. I worked here as a front-end developer focusing on Nation TV website which just have launched
content: Nation TV is a well-known Thai news channel. My works here focus on Nation TV website. We already developed once when I started working here and now once again. Here I can learn how to write semantic and SEO-friendly HTML to help the website rank higher on the top Thailand's news website. Besides, I worked on some other projects using Stylus and Foundation such as Live Story, Nation Radio, and The People.

name: taskworld
title: taskworld
intro: Taskworld is task and project management application. I took responsibility for creating a prototype with HTML5&CSS3.
content: Taskworld is task and project management application. I took responsibility for creating a prototype with HTML5&CSS3. Here encouraged me to learn a new technology such as NodeJs, AngularJs, and Git. Also, experienced in team up with Agile and Lean process. Starting morning with scrum daily 15 minutes meeting

name: varisoft
title: varisoft

images.alt: Varisoft - creative software house one page website

intro: This onepage website is for Varisoft, web and mobile application development studio. I worked on it all process on my own.
content: This onepage website is for Varisoft, web and mobile application development studio. I built it from the ground up. Since thinking the concept, I wrote the content, styled the look and finally made website. I tried to pass through the right message to their customers.

name: plantmoney
title: Plant Money
intro: This landing page introduces Plantmoney which was an awarded financial mobile application in 2014. I worked on both design and code by myself.
content: This landing page introduces Plantmoney which was an awarded financial mobile application in 2014. I worked on both design and code by myself. Also, I drawed and animated a cartoon plant in the application using Adobe Illustrator and Flash

intro: Delivery Thai is a japanese creative agency where I used to work for. I was assigned to create small websites whose purpose for affiliate marketing
content: When I worked for Delivery Thai, I was assigned to create small websites whose purpose for marketing the product of company's clients. With one product, I had to design and make more than 20 different websites. Moreover, I designed some mobile version websites.

name: recipe
title: Recipe
intro: A salad is a Wordpress blog consisting of variety of healthy lifestyle content
content: A salad is a blog consisting of variety of healthy lifestyle including healthy dish recipe, organic food shop, exercise activity, knowledge for health. Building a website from Sage, wordpress starter theme with Gulp, Sass, Bootstrap.

name: cuddle
title: Cuddle
intro: A premium homewares factory which specialise in seat pads, chair pads, and cushions, under the brand name Cuddle
content: A premium homewares factory which specialise in seat pads, chair pads, and cushions, under the brand name Cuddle. I developed this site with AngularJs and Sass.
